General.Name: Suzhou Alton Electrical & Mechanical Industry Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Suzhou Alton Electrical & Mechanical Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of air power and cleaning equipment in the United States, Europe, and internationally. It offers small air compressors, wet and dry vacuum cleaners, industrial fans, floor cleaning machineries, and accessories and other products. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Suzhou, China.
